FlexLinearAlgebra.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    FlexLinearAlgebra.FlexConvert — Function.

    FlexConvert(vec) converts the vector vec into a FlexVector.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.FlexLinearAlgebra
    FlexLinearAlgebra.FlexMatrix — Type.

    FlexMatrix{T}(rows,cols) creates a new FlexMatrix with rows indexed by rows, columns indexed by cols and all zero entries of type T (which is Number if omitted).

    FlexMatrix(v::FlexVector) converts v into a one-column FlexMatrix whose sole column index is Int(1)

    FlexLinearAlgebra.FlexOnes — Function.

    FlexOnes(T,dom) creates an all 1s vector indexed by dom. If T is missing, values default to Float64.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.FlexVector — Type.

    FlexVector{T}(idx) creates a new FlexVector with entries indexed by idx filled with zeros of type T (which defaults to Number)

    FlexLinearAlgebra._mush
    FlexLinearAlgebra.col_keys — Function.

    col_keys(M::FlexMatrix) returns a list of the keys to the columns of M.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.delete_col! — Function.

    delete_col!(A,c) deletes row c from the FlexMatrix A.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.delete_entry! — Function.

    delete_entry!(v,x) deletes the entry indexed by x in the FlexVector x.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.delete_row! — Function.

    delete_row!(A,r) deletes row r from the FlexMatrix A.

    FlexLinearAlgebra.eval
    FlexLinearAlgebra.include
    FlexLinearAlgebra.row_keys — Function.

    row_keys(M::FlexMatrix) returns a list of the keys to the rows of M.
